attributes.additional_details:
Scrap the un-fair and un-competitive tax. It discourages travelers from the UK, affecting our airlines competitiveness, and more importantly it discourages travelers to the UK, because its just cheaper for them to go elsewhere.

We have the highest APD in Europe, 20X that of France, and one of only 3 countries in Europe that actually have one!

Scrap it, and make our airlines competitive again, and make air travel cheaper again for us all!
